title: Helen Hunt 'recovering' following Los Angeles car crash
text:
CLOSE Helen Hunt has been released from the hospital following a traffic accident in which her car flipped on its side, according to multiple reports. USA TODAY

Helen Hunt is recovering at home after an accident in which her car flipped on its side.

People and TMZ reported that the actress, 56, was transported to a nearby hospital after an accident in Los Angeles. Hunt's representative Stephen Huvane told USA TODAY that Hunt is now recovering at home with "no major injuries."

LAPD spokesperson Officer Drake Madison confirmed to USA TODAY that an accident involving two vehicles took place Wednesday at 4:50 p.m. on San Vincente Boulevard in Los Angeles, but declined to name the parties involved. One person was transported to the hospital, he added.

Footage obtained by TMZ shows a white car striking a black SUV in the middle of an intersection with Wednesday's time stamp. The SUV continues to skid through the intersection before rolling onto the driver's side.

In this file photo, Helen Hunt speaks at a panel during the PBS Television Critics Association Winter Press Tour in 2018. (Photo: Richard Shotwell/Invision/AP)

Hunt is best known for her Academy Award-winning performance in 1997's "As Good as It Gets," as well as here four-time Emmy-winning role as Jamie Buchman in "Mad About You."
